IX.iii.1.D.6.l
.
Handling Situations When the Status of the Other Parent Is Unknown
The rate of Parents’ DIC payable is affected by whether the claimant is a
sole surviving parent
or
one of two parents
.  If a Parents' DIC claimant cannot establish that the Veteran’s other parent is deceased, the parent must be paid as
one of two parents
.
